content.rendered:
Due to illness, tonights Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band’s concert at Nationwide Arena has been postponed.
We are working on rescheduling the date so please hold on to your tickets as they will be valid for the rescheduled show.

excerpt.rendered: Due to illness, tonights Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band’s concert at Nationwide Arena has been postponed.We are working on rescheduling the date so please hold on to your tickets as they will be valid for the rescheduled show.
